snippet.title: Floppy Knights - Version 2.0 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Floppy Knights v2.0 is available on Steam, Xbox, and now... Nintendo Switch!

Floppy Knights on Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/floppy-knights-switch/
Floppy Knights on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1057800/Floppy_Knights/
Floppy Knights on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/floppy-knights/9NLM4TTHCWSH

Meet the Floppy Knights: tangible projections summoned from floppy disks! Tactics fuse with card game mechanics as Phoebe and Carlton, a brilliant young inventor & her robot-arm bestie, square off in turn-based battles. Select your Knights, hone your deck, and execute your strategy for victory!
......................

Check out our merch: https://www.rosecitygames.com/merch

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/rosecitygames
